dataList.name: The Inner Self
dataList.desc: Starting from Turn 3: gain 2 [AttackUp] at every Turn Start

dataList.name: Widening Knowledge
dataList.desc: Before Attack: the targeted enemy gains +1 Blunt Resist. (resets after Skill ends)

dataList.name: Spirit of Fixers
dataList.desc:
Remove the first Stagger Threshold from this unit
When hit, gain 1 [Protection], 1 [AttackUp], and heal 3 SP (once per turn)

dataList.name: The Tianya Sword
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 15+ [Breath] Potency, halve [Breath] Potency and gain the following effects:
- All allies, including this unit, heal 10 HP
- All allies, including this unit, heal 3 SP
- Halve all removable negative effects from all allies, including this unit

dataList.name: How to Prepare for War
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: heals 10 SP, gain 2 [AttackUp], and 2 [DefenseUp]

dataList.name: How to Survive
dataList.desc: In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Apathetic Response
dataList.desc: When other allies are hit, gain 1 [AttackUp]; then, gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: POW Torture Technique
dataList.desc: On Hit: if target has [Binding] or [Laceration], gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: The Reassuring Heart
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies, including this unit, heals 5 SP
Combat Start: if the main target's SP is equal to or higher than this unit's, gain 1 [Protection] (once per turn)

dataList.name: God of Gamblers
dataList.desc: On Clash Win without losing any Coins: regardless of whether they hit or not, if every Coin flipped by that Skill, down to the final Coin, flipped heads, the final Coin deals +30% damage

dataList.name: My Bestie and a Rival
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if Sinner Sinclair is participating in this battle, this unit and Sinclair both gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] (does not count if he is a Backup Unit)

dataList.name: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.desc: Turn Start: apply 1 [DefenseUp] to all allies, including this unit

dataList.name: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.desc: Turn Start: apply 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] to all allies, including this unit

dataList.name: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.desc: Turn Start: apply 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] to all allies, including this unit

dataList.name: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.desc: Turn Start: apply 3 [AttackUp] and 3 [DefenseUp] to all allies, including this unit

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: On Clash Lose, gain 1 [Protection] and 3 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: On Clash Lose, gain 1 [Protection], 1 [AttackUp], and 3 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: On Clash Lose, gain 2 [Protection], 1 [AttackUp], and 3 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: On Clash Lose, gain 2 [Protection], 1 [AttackUp], and 4 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Jin Gang Bolus
dataList.desc: On Clash Lose, gain 3 [Protection], 1 [AttackUp], and 4 [DefenseUp] (2 times per turn)
